name: ai-ocr-add-rows
description: This project is a web-based demonstration of an AI-powered Optical Character Recognition (OCR) tool designed to automate data entry for purchase order forms. It allows users to upload images of documents, extracts line-item data using the Google Gemini API, and automatically populates a web form with the extracted information.

meta.note: Node.js not required; open index.html directly in your browser.
